Name: Cobos
About the game: Just watch the video to understand what the game is like. If you have already watched then there are some tips: - It's a 3rd person arena shooter; - Enemies spawn in special order and you have to find out it to win; - Every enemy has a special behavior, weapon and task; - Where you run is more important than who you are going to kill; - It's ok if you die 10-20 times before win the first battle. - Don't forget to use a second weapon.
Meta Title: Cobos: Oct 17, 2017, Anton Shatalov and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cobos? Check out the release date (Oct 17, 2017), developer insights from Anton Shatalov, and a complete game summary.
